mapper.insert: insert into WETBT (WRTBT_NO, WRTBT_TEXT, WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT, AVLBL_BEGIN_DT, AVLBL_END_DT, MB_NO, BBS_NO, WRTBT_DSTNCT, RCMD_CO,NCMD_CO,FIND_CO, GROUP_NO,ORDER_NO,DEPTH,WRTBT_TITLE, WRITR_INFO_OPNG_YN, CONSL_BBS_DSTNCT,ORGNZ_NO) values (null, #{wrtbtText },'원글',now(),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",#{mbNo }, #{bbsNo },'상담게시판', 0,0,0,( select ifnull( max( GROUP_NO ), 0 ) + 1 from WETBT a ), 1,0, #{wrtbtTitle }, #{writrInfoOpngYn }, #{conslBbsDstnct }, #{orgnzNo } )
mapper.select: select WRTBT_NO wrtbtNo, WRTBT_TEXT wrtbtText, WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT wrtbtTypeDstnct, AVLBL_BEGIN_DT avlblBeginDt, AVLBL_END_DT avlblEndDt, MB_NO mbNo, BBS_NO bbsNo, WRTBT_DSTNCT wrtbtDstnct, RCMD_CO rcmdCo,NCMD_CO ncmdCo,FIND_CO findCo, GROUP_NO groupNo,ORDER_NO orderNo,DEPTH depth,WRTBT_TITLE wrtbtTitle, CONSL_BBS_DSTNCT conslBbsDstnct,ORGNZ_NO orgnzNo, (select count(*) from wetbt e where w. WRTBT_NO= e.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO) count from wetbt w where WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT='원글' group by AVLBL_BEGIN_DT desc;

select WRTBT_NO wrtbtNo, BBS_NO bbsNo, WRTBT_DSTNCT wrtbtDstnct, (select MB_NO from wetbt e where w. WRTBT_NO= e.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO group by RCMD_CO desc limit 1) mbNo, (select m.nknm from wetbt e, mb m where w. WRTBT_NO= e.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO and m.mb_no=e.MB_NO group by RCMD_CO desc limit 1) nknm, (select AVLBL_BEGIN_DT from wetbt e where w. WRTBT_NO= e.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO group by RCMD_CO desc limit 1) avlblBeginDt, (select WRTBT_TEXT from wetbt e where w. WRTBT_NO= e.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO group by RCMD_CO desc limit 1) wrtbtText, (select RCMD_CO from wetbt e where w. WRTBT_NO= e.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO group by RCMD_CO desc limit 1) rcmdCo from wetbt w where WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT='원글' group by AVLBL_BEGIN_DT desc;

select w.WRTBT_NO wrtbtNo,w.WRTBT_TEXT wrtbtText, w.WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT wrtbtTypeDstnct, date_format(w.AVLBL_BEGIN_DT,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s") avlblBeginDt, w.AVLBL_END_DT avlblEndDt, w.MB_NO mbNo, w.BBS_NO bbsNo, w.WRTBT_DSTNCT wrtbtDstnct, w.RCMD_CO rcmdCo,w.NCMD_CO ncmdCo,w.FIND_CO findCo, w.GROUP_NO groupNo,w.ORDER_NO orderNo,w.DEPTH depth,w.WRTBT_TITLE wrtbtTitle, w.WRITR_INFO_OPNG_YN writrInfoOpngYn, w.CONSL_BBS_DSTNCT conslBbsDstnct,w.ORGNZ_NO orgnzNo, TRUNCATE(date_format(now(),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s")-date_format(m.BIRDT,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s"), -1) birdt, substr(m.AGRG,1,2) agrg, m.NKNM nknm from wetbt w, mb m where w.MB_NO = m.MB_NO and w.WRTBT_NO=#{no};

select w.WRTBT_NO wrtbtNo,w.WRTBT_TEXT wrtbtText, w.WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT wrtbtTypeDstnct, date_format(w.AVLBL_BEGIN_DT,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s") avlblBeginDt, w.AVLBL_END_DT avlblEndDt, w.MB_NO mbNo, w.BBS_NO bbsNo, w.WRTBT_DSTNCT wrtbtDstnct, w.RCMD_CO rcmdCo,w.NCMD_CO ncmdCo,w.FIND_CO findCo, w.GROUP_NO groupNo,w.ORDER_NO orderNo,w.DEPTH depth,w.WRTBT_TITLE wrtbtTitle, w.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO prntsWrtbtNo, w.CWR_DSTNCT cwrDstnct, w.WRITR_INFO_OPNG_YN writrInfoOpngYn, w.CONSL_BBS_DSTNCT conslBbsDstnct,w.ORGNZ_NO orgnzNo, TRUNCATE(date_format(now(),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s")-date_format(m.BIRDT,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s"), -1) birdt, substr(m.AGRG,1,2) agrg, m.NKNM nknm from wetbt w, mb m where w.MB_NO = m.MB_NO and w.PRNTS_WRTBT_NO=#{no} order by w.RCMD_CO desc;
mapper.insert: insert into WETBT (WRTBT_NO, WRTBT_TEXT, WRTBT_TYPE_DSTNCT, AVLBL_BEGIN_DT, AVLBL_END_DT, MB_NO, BBS_NO, WRTBT_DSTNCT, RCMD_CO,NCMD_CO,FIND_CO,GROUP_NO,ORDER_NO,DEPTH, PRNTS_WRTBT_NO, CWR_DSTNCT, WRITR_INFO_OPNG_YN, CONSL_BBS_DSTNCT,ORGNZ_NO) values (null, #{wrtbtText },'답글',now(),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",#{mbNo }, #{bbsNo },'상담게시판', 0,0,0, (select GROUP_NO from WETBT a where wrtbt_no=#{prntsWrtbtNo }), (select max(ORDER_NO) from WETBT a where wrtbt_no=#{prntsWrtbtNo }), 1,#{prntsWrtbtNo }, '답변글', #{writrInfoOpngYn }, (select CONSL_BBS_DSTNCT from WETBT a where WRTBT_NO=#{prntsWrtbtNo }), #{orgnzNo } )
